A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was very critical of TFA. I didn't like it. Last Jedi is amazing. People who are oh so serious must have the forgotten that Star Wars started as a space western.  The first trilogy was two parts tongue in cheek with a side of The Empire Strikes Back. That's the formula here and it works.  I read reviews of people who are mad at the science. They bought a ticket to a movie about a mystical force permeating the universe--either suspend your disbelief or don't.
